The 11th International Conference on
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics

[edit]

March 21 - 24, 2007
San Juan, Puerto Rico

The 11th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics (Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 2010) will be held in San Juan, Puerto Rico from Wednesday, 21 March 2007 to Saturday, 24 March 2007 at the Caribe Hilton Hotel.

Since its inception in 1985, AISTATS has been an interdisciplinary gathering of researchers at the intersection of artificial intelligence, machine learning, statistics, and related areas.

The Proceedings of Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 2010 are now available.

Collocated with the Learning Workshop, March 19-22, 2007.

The AISTATS 2007 Proceedings are now available on-line.
